mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT jd.JOB_NAME , jd.JOB_GROUP , jd.JOB_CLASS_NAME , t.DESCRIPTION , t.TRIGGER_STATE , t.START_TIME , t.END_TIME , st.REPEAT_INTERVAL, ct.CRON_EXPRESSION FROM QRTZ_JOB_DETAILS jd LEFT JOIN QRTZ_TRIGGERS t ON jd.JOB_NAME = t.JOB_NAME and jd.JOB_GROUP = t.TRIGGER_GROUP LEFT JOIN QRTZ_CRON_TRIGGERS ct ON t.TRIGGER_NAME = ct.TRIGGER_NAME and t.TRIGGER_GROUP = ct.TRIGGER_GROUP LEFT JOIN QRTZ_SIMPLE_TRIGGERS st on t.TRIGGER_NAME = st.TRIGGER_NAME and t.TRIGGER_GROUP = st.REPEAT_COUNT
